sentences.english: Imported meat products must come from non-epizootic disease countries or regions.
sentences.chinese: 进口的肉类产品应来自无动物疫病流行的国家或地区。

sentences.english: For years, Henan officials attempted to cover up the epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 多年来，河南官员百般掩盖这个疫病。

sentences.english: Blight appeared in Ireland on Sept. 13.
sentences.chinese: 9月13日，晚疫病出现在了爱尔兰。

sentences.english: PH7 was the most suitable for the growth and sporulation of A.
sentences.chinese: 适于番茄早疫病菌生长及产孢的PH值都为7。

sentences.english: The epidemic disease in the Wei, Jin, Sixteen States and Northern Dynasties spread continuously.
sentences.chinese: 魏晋十六国北朝疫病流行呈现出连绵不断的趋势。

sentences.english: Temperature is a very important factor for the epidemic of disease.
sentences.chinese: 温度是影响晚疫病流行的重要因子。

sentences.english: It can be used to prevent and cure Hepatitis B and other immune diseases.
sentences.chinese: 因此，它是一种防治乙型肝炎及其他免疫病的药物。

sentences.english: The serum that could stop the outbreak was 674 miles away in Anchorage.
sentences.chinese: 遏止疫病的血清远在六百七十四英里外的安克雷奇市。

sentences.english: In 12 cases the EN was just the cutaneous manifestation of some kind of immunological diseases.
sentences.chinese: 另12例则是某些免疫病的一种皮肤表现。

sentences.english: This has not been shown to be associated with systemic disease, such as autoimmune disease.
sentences.chinese: 并未显示其与系统疾病如自身免疫病相关。

sentences.english: The inoculation test also illustrated the of effect combination to control the pepper blight caused by Phytophthora capsici.
sentences.chinese: 接种试验也证明其对辣椒疫病具有较好的防治作用。

sentences.english: Good results have been made in potato late blight warning system and the control of plant diseases and pests.
sentences.chinese: 马铃薯晚疫病预警系统建设和综合防治取得显著成效。

sentences.english: High relative humidity in field was favorable for occurrence and epidemic of late blight.
sentences.chinese: 田间相对湿度高，对晚疫病发生与流行十分有利。

sentences.english: Regionalization is a development trend of international management of animal epidemic disease.
sentences.chinese: 区域化管理成为国际动物疫病管理的发展趋势。

sentences.english: He says it is possible to grow potatoes that resist late blight.
sentences.chinese: 他说，种植能够抵抗晚疫病的马铃薯是可能的。

sentences.english: Reporting any signs of disease is key for surveillance and control measures.
sentences.chinese: 对任何疫病迹象进行报告是监测和防控措施的关键。

definition: insect damage/destruction of crops by pest insects
to catch an illness/to get infected with a disease
porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome (PRRS)/blue-ear swine fever
